recipes.name: Mole
recipes.description: A rich and complex Mexican sauce made with chili peppers, spices, chocolate, and nuts.

recipes.name: Tacos al Pastor
recipes.description: Marinated pork cooked on a vertical spit and served in corn tortillas with pineapple.

recipes.name: Chiles Rellenos
recipes.description: Poblano peppers stuffed with cheese or meat, battered and fried.

recipes.name: Pozole
recipes.description: A traditional hominy soup made with pork or chicken and red chili broth.

recipes.name: Tamales
recipes.description: Corn dough filled with meats, cheese, or chilies, wrapped in corn husks and steamed.

recipes.name: Enchiladas
recipes.description: Corn tortillas rolled around a filling and covered with chili sauce.

recipes.name: Guacamole
recipes.description: A fresh avocado dip mixed with lime juice, onion, tomato, and cilantro.

recipes.name: Quesadillas
recipes.description: Tortillas filled with melted cheese and sometimes meat or vegetables.

recipes.name: Sopes
recipes.description: Thick corn tortillas topped with beans, meat, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

recipes.name: Tostadas
recipes.description: Crispy fried tortillas topped with beans, meat, lettuce, and crema.

recipes.name: Chilaquiles
recipes.description: Fried tortilla chips simmered in red or green salsa, topped with cheese and cream.

recipes.name: Elote
recipes.description: Grilled corn on the cob covered with mayonnaise, cheese, chili powder, and lime.

recipes.name: Carnitas
recipes.description: Slow-cooked pork that is tender on the inside and crispy on the outside.

recipes.name: Barbacoa
recipes.description: Slow-cooked meat traditionally prepared in an underground pit.

recipes.name: Birria
recipes.description: A spicy stew made with goat or beef, often served with tortillas.

recipes.name: Cochinita Pibil
recipes.description: Slow-roasted pork marinated in achiote and citrus juices.

recipes.name: Pambazos
recipes.description: Bread dipped in chili sauce and filled with potatoes, chorizo, and cheese.

recipes.name: Flautas
recipes.description: Rolled tortillas filled with meat and deep-fried until crispy.

recipes.name: Menudo
recipes.description: A traditional soup made with beef tripe in a red chili broth.

recipes.name: Arroz con Leche
recipes.description: A sweet rice pudding made with milk, cinnamon, and sugar.
